tool_description: Our API provides a range of powerful tools to enhance your web applications. From retrieving public IP addresses and detailed IP information to scanning ports for open connections, our API simplifies network-related tasks. Securely authenticate with an API key and access valuable data to optimize your application's functionality.
name: IP Insight API
title: IP Insight API

api_list.name: /scan-ports/ipAddress/startPort/endPort
api_list.description: Scans a range of ports on a specified IP address to check for open ports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-insight-api.p.rapidapi.com/scan-ports/188.204.115.49/80/100"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-insight-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-insight-api.p.rapidapi.com/scan-ports/{ipaddress}/{startport}/{endport}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-insight-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /ip/ipAddress
api_list.description: Retrieves information about a specified IP address, including its location and timezone.

api_list.name: /ip
api_list.description: Retrieves the public IP address of the client making the request.
